mapper.select: SELECT shop_item_id, shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_img, shop_item_date FROM ShopItems WHERE shop_item_id = #{shopItemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ShopItems (shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_price, shop_item_img, shop_item_stock) VALUES (#{shopItemName}),(#{shopItemDesc}),(#{shopItemPrice}),(#{shopItemImg}),(#{shopItemStock})
